headline: Soaring Memory Prices Lift Chipmakers, Pressure Apple and HP
summary: AI-driven memory shortages are boosting suppliers while rising costs weigh on hardware makers' margins and outlooks.

headline: Bernstein names winners and losers in the AI driven data explosion
summary: Investing.com -- Bernstein says the accelerating AI-driven data boom is reshaping the technology landscape, lifting memory and storage providers while pressuring hardware makers struggling with surging component costs.
